sqlQuery.name: SampleBySampleId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.Samples s, ($$sample_id$$) ds WHERE lower(s.name) = lower(ds.name) UNION SELECT distinct uds.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM apidbUserDatasets.UD_Sample uds, ($$sample_id$$) ds WHERE lower(uds.name) = lower(ds.name)

sqlQuery.name: SampleByMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM apidbTuning.Samples s, apidbTuning.SampleProcess sds WHERE sds.output_pan_id in ($$samples_filter_metadata$$) AND sds.OUTPUT_ISA_TYPE = 'Data' AND s.pan_id = sds.protocol_app_node_id ORDER BY s.name
